00521     class QicsOverrideSetting {
00522     public:
00523     inline QicsOverrideSetting()
00524         { myIndex = -1; myVal = -1; }
00525     inline QicsOverrideSetting(int idx, int val)
00526         { myIndex = idx; myVal = val; }
00527 
00528     inline QicsOverrideSetting(const QicsOverrideSetting &os)
00529         { myIndex = os.myIndex; myVal = os.myVal; }
00530 
00531     inline int index(void) const
00532         { return myIndex; }
00533 
00534     inline void setIndex(int idx)
00535         { myIndex = idx; }
00536 
00537     inline int value(void) const
00538         { return myVal; }
00539 
00540     inline void setValue(int val)
00541         { myVal = val;; }
00542 
00543     protected:
00544     int myIndex;
00545     int myVal;
00546     };
00547     typedef QValueList<QicsOverrideSetting> QicsOverrideSettingL;
